refnamediv.refpurpose: Restores the visibility of a previously hidden FLTK widget.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: FLshow restores the visibility of a previously hidden widget.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ihandle -- an integer number (used as unique identifier) taken from the output of a previously located widget opcode (which corresponds to the target widget). It is used to unequivocally identify the widget when modifying its appearance with this class of opcodes. The user must not set the ihandle value directly, otherwise a Csound crash will occur.
